title: The Trillion-Dollar Machine Powering Abu Dhabi’s Global Ambitions
description: Deep pools of wealth have given Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, unprecedented sway over global finance, energy and AI.
content: Deep pools of wealth have given Abu Dhabi, the capital of the United Arab Emirates, unprecedented sway over global finance, energy and AI.
